name: The Divine Fall
description:
This is a simple & casual platformer game.

It was the first game developed by the team.

The game was inspired from book Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri.

Here's a link to our Game Board Document made at Milanote, it has the GDD, Assets & Arts used in the game:
https://app.milanote.com/1NSdTo1Lteoa27?p=4su8e3oubEe

Hope you enjoy it!

See you!

A brief backstory of the game:
" The devil, enchanted by the beauty of the human Beatriz, wife of Dante, decides to capture her and hold her in the deepest level of hell, so only he and no other earthly creature will contemplate her beauty. Dante, upon learning of his beloved's condition, cannot bear the idea of living without her. So, Dante accepts dying as a means of rescuing her and taking her to paradise with him. "
